word_mean: 距离：二参照物或点之间的测量间距

sentence.Network_en: Jay had always tended to keep his girlfriends at a distance.

sentence.Network_en: He stares detachedly into the middle distance, towards nothing in particular.
sentence.Network_cn: 他漠然而漫无目标地注视着不远处。

sentence.Network_en: By half distance we held a comfortable two-lap lead.
sentence.Network_cn: 到半程时，我们轻松领先两圈。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Boxing)complete a fight without being knocked out
jx.jx_cn_mean: (拳击)坚持下来，在比赛中未被击倒

lj.lj_ly: keep your distance from birds feeding their young.
lj.lj_ls: 离给幼鸟喂食的鸟远点。

jx.jx_en_mean: near enough to reach by the means specified

lj.lj_ls: 她的公寓很近，走过去就到了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'discord, debate'): from Old French or from Latin distantia, from distant- 'standing apart', from the verb distare (see distant)

entry.def: The distance between two points or places is the amount of space between them.

example.ex: ...the distance between the island and the nearby shore...
example.tran: 该岛和附近陆地之间的距离
不管什么地方，都是走几步就到了。

entry.def: When two things are very far apart, you talk about the distance between them.

example.ex: The distance wouldn't be a problem.

entry.def: Distance learning or distance education involves studying at home and sending your work to a college or university, rather than attending the college or university in person.

example.ex: I'm doing a theology degree by distance learning.
example.tran: 我正通过远程教育课程攻读神学学位。

entry.tran: （人际关系的）疏远；（事物间的）差距
entry.def: When you want to emphasize that two people or things do not have a close relationship or are not the same, you can refer to the distance between them.

example.tran: 他们之间情感上的疏远

example.ex: There was a vast distance between psychological clues and concrete proof...
example.tran: 心理提示和确凿证据之间相差甚远。

entry.def: If you can see something in the distance, you can see it, far away from you.

example.ex: We suddenly saw her in the distance...
example.tran: 我们突然看见她在远处。

example.ex: Mr. Dambar found himself gazing into the distance for a moment or two.
example.tran: 丹巴先生不知不觉朝远方凝视了片刻。

entry.def: Distance is coolness or unfriendliness in the way that someone behaves towards you.

example.ex: There were periods of sulking, of pronounced distance, of coldness.
example.tran: 沉闷、明显不友好和冷淡的场面多次出现。

entry.tran: 使疏远;对…冷淡;使不介入
entry.def: If you distance yourself from a person or thing, or if something distances you from them, you feel less friendly or positive towards them, or become less involved with them.

example.ex: The author distanced himself from some of the comments in his book...
example.tran: 作者使自己书中的某些评论不带个人色彩。

example.ex: Television may actually be distancing the public from the war.
example.tran: 电视实际上可能让公众远离战争。

entry.tran: 在远处;相距遥远;久远地
entry.def: If you are at a distance from something, or if you see it or remember it from a distance, you are a long way away from it in space or time.

example.ex: The only way I can cope with my mother is at a distance...
example.tran: 我可以和我妈妈相处的唯一方法就是保持距离。

example.ex: Now I can look back on the whole tragedy from a distance of forty years.
example.tran: 时隔40年后，现在我可以回顾整个悲剧了。

entry.def: If you keep your distance from someone or something or keep them at a distance, you do not become involved with them.

example.ex: Jay had always tended to keep his girlfriends at a distance.
example.tran: 杰伊一贯和他的女朋友们保持距离。

entry.def: If you keep your distance from someone or something, you do not get physically close to them.

example.ex: He walked towards the doorway, careful to keep his distance.
example.tran: 他走向门口，小心翼翼地保持着距离。

means.word_mean: 1. the property created by the space between two objects or points

sentences.sentence: "I could see it in the distance"

means.word_mean: 3. size of the gap between two places;

sentences.sentence: "the distance from New York to Chicago"
"he determined the length of the shortest line segment joining the two points"
"it all happened in the space of 10 minutes"
"if that happens it will be at some distance in the future"
"at a distance of ten years he had forgotten many of the details"
"we have to distance ourselves from these events in order to continue living"

stems_affixes.word_buile: stagn=stan站,立+ant……的→站着不走,停滞的
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的
stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+fast→稳固的
dis分开+stance=stan站,立→分开站着→有距离→距离
equi平等+distance[n.距离, 远离]→n.等距离
home家+stead=stand[v.站, 立, 站起]→站再家里的→处在家的→家园,家宅
in内+stan站,立+ce→站在里面的东西,表示就在面前→例子
stand确立+ard→n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 站立, 身分, 名望, 持续
stems_affixes.word_buile: stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+ing状态→n.站立, 身分, 名望, 持续
stand[v.站, 立, 站起]+point点→n.立场, 观点

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物质;实质,本质;主旨;财产,资产
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+stance=stan站,立→放在下面之物
stan站,立+d→v.站, 立, 站起

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使符合标准, 使标准化
stems_affixes.word_buile: standard[n. 标准, 规格 adj.标准的]+ize表动词→v.使符合标准, 使标准化

Sentence.sentence: And at least for now, that hazy mirage in the distance?
They have strong wings capable of flying long distances.
But it is only by having some distance from the world that you can see it whole, and understand what you should be doing with it.

sentences.en: Oil painting is to be appreciated at a distance.
sentences.cn: 油画要在一定的距离外欣赏。

sentences.en: You can see the mountain in the distance.
We spotted them at a distance of two hundred yards.
sentences.cn: 我们在相距200码处就看到他们。

sentences.en: Things look different at a distance of 10 years.
sentences.cn: 时隔十年, 情况不同了。

jushi.english: I spotted something dark in the distance.
jushi.chinese: 我望见远方有个黑黑的东西。

jushi.english: Look ahead in the distance, you can just see the lights of the village.
jushi.chinese: 你若向前方远处看,你就能看见村里的灯光。

jushi.english: We heard gunfire in the distance.
